snippet: In a new take on an old business model, online entrepreneurs have come up with creative ways to sell products, like dog food, that have not traditionally been sold by subscription.
abstract: Online entrepreneurs have come up with creative ways to sell products, like dog food, that have not traditionally been sold by subscription; pet food delivery service PetFlow had $13 million-plus revenue in 2011 and projects 2012 revenue will exceed $30 million.
lead_paragraph: In a new take on an old business model, online entrepreneurs have come up with creative ways to sell products, like dog food, that have not traditionally been sold by subscription.

headline.seo: Selling Online Products by Subscription Is All the Rage
headline.main: Among Online Entrepreneurs, Subscriptions Are All the Rage
headline.print_headline: Among Online Entrepreneurs, Subscriptions Are All the Rage
